name: Duck vs Chicken!
description:
Duck vs Chicken! is a 3D Casual Sports game. It's an offline multiplayer between a Duck and a Chicken where the player scoring 5 points wins. Sounds easy? Grab a friend, give it a try, and have fun!

This prototype was made within 48 hours.
Hope you enjoy it!

- Designed and Developed by Harshit Arora
- Art by JGM
- Music by Sankalp Yaduwanshi
